definitions: An egg custard cooked in a mold and cut into shapes, used as a garnish for soups.
A type of drink, typically a cocktail made with champagne.
A battle royale; a fight or competition involving many participants until one remains.
examples: The chef added a savory royale to the consommé.
She ordered a Kir Royale at the bar.
The game ended in a tense battle royale.
